column1: '''The Root of the Boot''' is a poem written by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column2: set to the tune of ''The Fox Went Out''. It was published in ''[[Songs for the Philologists]]''. It has been reprinted in
''[[The Tolkien Papers|The Tolkien Papers: Mankato Studies in English]]''
column5: in ''[[The Return of the Shadow]]''. It is an early version of the poem ''[[The Stone Troll]]''.

column1: *[http://library.leeds.ac.uk/special-collections/view/879/j_r_r_tolkien_the_root_of_the_boot The Root of the Boot manuscript at University of Leeds]
